attributes.action: Change the uk national anthem from 'God save the king' to 'Rule Britannia'
attributes.additional_details:
'Rule Britannia' as a national anthem represents the people more. 'God save the king/queen' is an old traditional anthem which doesn't represent the British people, ideals and freedoms we have as a proud nation.

Not only that but the anthem has better sounding lyrics and appealing to the ear. There is only benefit to come with this simple change
attributes.background: Simple change of national anthem of the United kingdom

rejection.details:
The use of the present National Anthem is a matter of tradition rather than having any legal status.

You can find more information about the history and status of the national anthem here:

https://www.royal.uk/national-anthem
